alert.note: Alert for Coweta; Fayette (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 4:47AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Fayette and Coweta Counties through 515 AM EDT... At 447 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Madras, or near Newnan, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Newnan, Fayetteville, Peachtree City, Tyrone, Palmetto, Senoia, Grantville, Moreland, Sharpsburg, Turin, Haralson, East Newnan, Starrs Mill, Cannongate, Sandy Creek, Thomas Crossroads and Madras. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
